author: Chelsea Ritschel, Chelsea Ritschel
title: Michelle Obama says she feels 'newfound sense of gratitude for all the little moments' in Easter message
description: Obama family has been quarantining at home together amid coronavirus pandemic
content:
Michelle Obama is celebrating Easter by reflecting on her newfound gratitude amid the coronavirus pandemic.
On Sunday, the former first lady shared pictures of her familys time at the White House celebrating Easter and Passover.
In the first photo, Michelle… [+2058 chars]
